content: {"locationId": "5981", "organizationId": "5073", "name": "Seligman Care Club", "address1": "54260 N Sunrise Lane", "address2": "", "city": "Seligman", "state": "AZ", "zipCode": "86337", "country": null, "phone": "928-716-6488", "phoneExt": "", "website": null, "latitude": "35.32932", "longitude": "-112.92168", "foodPrograms": "Pop-Up/Mobile Resource", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "", "features": "", "aboutUs": "Seligman Care Club is dedicated to providing a helping hand to our community.  Distribution for seniors is the second Monday of every month from 10:30 am to 1:30 pm.  Distribution of commodities is the fourth Monday of every month from 10:30 am to 1:30 pm.    The Care Club is located on Sunrise Lane, just south of old Route 66 across the railroad tracks and east of Fort Rock Road.  Applications are available on distribution days.", "notes": "", "contactName": "Ann Fillion", "contactPhone": "928-716-6488", "contactEmail": "fillyinfield@gmail.com", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "Accepts Walk-Ins, CSFP Program, Curbside Pickup / Drive Through, Outdoor Service, Pre-Packed Boxes / Bags, TEFAP Program", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "Dairy, Eggs, Fruits & Vegetables, Meat, Shelf Stable/Non-Perishable Goods", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 44, "regionName": "St. Mary's Food Bank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "71a2fe75-eba6-4f29-916b-d3614dd69e78.png", "website": "https://www.firstfoodbank.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "US Mountain Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "MST", "offsetHours": "-7", "schedules": ["Monday 10:30 AM-1:30 PM [ 2nd week(s)]", "Monday 10:30 AM-1:30 PM [ 2nd, 4th week(s)]", "Monday 10:30 AM-1:30 PM [ 2nd, 4th week(s)]"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
